title: Saving attachments
content: Whenever I try to save an attachment, whether by right clicking on the file name or clicking on the Save icon, Thunderbird crashes, goes into a stall that has to be terminated by closing or ending in Task Manager. This is for both my gmail and hotmail accounts. The only way I seem to be able to save attachment is my dragging it off the Thunderbird window, to a destination folder such as my Desktop. I also cannot attach files; get similar software stall. I can drag files into an email message however. Using Thunderbird 115.1.1 on a Win10 computer, with Avast anti-virus. Same situation on at least the last 3-4 Thunderbird versions.
creator: thebugdoc01
